document_data.mainbody:
he House of Bulad was a family of weaponsmiths whom many considered to be some of the best in all of Zakhara around 1367 DR.
The fires of the House of Bulads smiths burned throughout the night in the foundries located just up Al-Wahl River from Hiyal.
Their patriarch, Bulad, specialized in forging swords. His daughter, Fuladayah bint Bulad, took over her fathers duties upon his death.
